title: applied to PBE a while ago. I never heard back.
body:
I just re applied, but I know i have tried to get onto the pbe by applying many times before. Is it really such a wait list to get on that it takes months on months?
Thank you for your support.

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct, you aren't guaranteed access to the PBE just by applying. We typically look for players who are would be great candidates to test what we're looking to try out on the PBE at the time. For this reason, the criteria changes up quite a bit, but we consistently look for *really active* summoners who are a *positive influence* on others. Check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details on this system.

Let me know if you have any questions.
So what if ive applied like 6 different times within one years?

On a single account? o.O I don't think that would affect your chances. Actively playing the game and having a positive attitude is probably the best thing you can do while waiting for an invite, in my opinion. ^.^

I'm very curious as to why you are allowed to enter your information if you forget your password but it informs you  will receive an email and I've never received one(after at least 7 attempts).{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
There isn't any set time for getting into PBE and its basically like a lottery. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
